text: RT @WSCCResilience: Flood Alerts have been issued by @EnvAgency for details go to https://t.co/67RDvsSGM6. Please take care of yourself, fa…
@EnvAgencySE It’s our garden for now but any more rain or build up of that ridiculously high river and our house will flood badly please help us prevent this.

@EnvAgencySE Please use the sluice gate and do this on the Cray river way behind Crayford Way. The sluice gate never seems to be used and we haven’t seen anyone taking care of our river for so long and it’s our house that will flood. https://t.co/8QnaVP3f5p

@EnvAgencySE Hi, I have a question about the sluice gate that affects the Crayford area. After 2 days of rain our garden is flooded and you can see the river is so so high, any more rain or build up our house will flood. Use the sluice gate please. Help prevent house flood for us https://t.co/QYPDsee2Ny
